In the Pokrovsky district in Krasnogorivka 2 people were killed and 1 wounded. In Kurakhovo, 3 people are injured.

About thisreportedHead of Donetsk Ova Vadim Filashkin.

“The operational situation in the region as of March 31. Volnovaksky District. The Epiphany of the Comedian community damaged the agricultural enterprise. Pokrovsky district. In Krasnogorivka 2 people were killed and 1 wounded. 3 people are injured in Kurakhovo; The community also damaged 5 private homes in Girnik, 4 in Kurakhivka and 1 in Izmailivka. In Nikolaevka, 3 houses were damaged in the Novogrodiv community, ”the message reads.

In the Kramatorsk district, 6 private homes were damaged in the Lyman community: 5 in Tern and 1 in Ivanivka. In Konstantinovka, a person is injured, 3 private homes were damaged.

«Bakhmut district. In the time community, 4 private homes, a multi -storey building and an industrial building are damaged. The house of the Seversky community damaged the house in the Serebryanka, ”the post specified.

In just a day, the Russians fired at the settlements of Donetsk region 18 times. 584 people were evacuated from the front line, including 33 children.

Earlier the chief of Donetsk Ova Vadim Filashkinwrote, which was used to strike in the Nikolaevka of Donetsk region, the Russians used four managed airplaces of the UMPB D-30SN.
